Articles.Content:
If reports came in of broken F5 buttons and KSP players passing out from cardiac arrest.

Whatever the case, if I'm not playing 0.22 tomorrow, I'm the the hospital from a cardiac arrest.

Mark my word, I shall press my F5 until it breaks, press my mouse until it breaks, and wait for 0.22 till hell freezes over.

EDIT: Heart rate has doubled. Showing intense signs of anxiety, including tons of sweating a the hands and shaky arms/legs
